,GHR,Milroy disease
How many people are affected by Milroy disease ?,Milroy disease is a rare disorder; its incidence is unknown.,GHR,Milroy disease
What are the genetic changes related to Milroy disease ?,"Mutations in the FLT4 gene cause some cases of Milroy disease. The FLT4 gene provides instructions for producing a protein called vascular endothelial growth factor receptor 3 (VEGFR-3), which regulates the development and maintenance of the lymphatic system.
